attributes.action: Hold a Referendum on full entry into the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I submit this petition for a Referendum on Europe before you sign your name to full entry into Europe contrary to the will of the British public. You are currently flying in the face of the electorate.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
